description: Luis Ulquiga was arrested on Tuesday in Doral, Florida and remains held on $35,000 bail. The 65-year-old man has denied the accusations.
title: Luis Ulquiga accused of raping his paralyzed adult stepdaughter
title_page: Luis Ulquiga accused of raping his paralyzed adult stepdaughter | Daily Mail Online
text:
A 65-year-old Florida man is in jail after allegedly raping his paralyzed adult stepdaughter.
Authorities in Miami say Luis Ulquiga entered his 33-year-old stepdaughter's room Tuesday morning and proceeded to remove her adult diaper before kissing her on the neck and then forcing intercourse, the Brandenton Herald reports.
Ulquiga allegedly left the room after the rape, and his stepdaughter - who is paralyzed from the waist down - got a phone to call for help.
Luis Ulquiga, 65, was arrested on Tuesday after allegedly raping his 33-year-old stepdaughter, who is paralyzed from the waist down
But he soon re-entered the room and snatched the phone away from her.
She was eventually able to alert authorities and Ulquiga was later arrested at a home in Doral.
He has since been charged with battery of a victim who is 'physically helpless' and tampering with a victim.
He remains held on $35,000 bond.
